A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Came in with an open-mind and then suddenly realized how inconsistent the film was. Tried too hard with a\, \"HERE'S A PLOT TWIST\, BUT HOLD ON WE WERE JUST JOKING.. THIS IS THE REAL PLOT TWIST.\" maybe 3 or so times. And Luke did not feel like Luke at all. (You'll know what I mean). The pacing of the film was a huge problem. I do admire their originality this time around but it was overall non-existent. Sorry\, this one is complete garbage.
